dt: {bc}any of a group of proteins especially of plants that are not antibodies and do not originate in an immune system but bind specifically to carbohydrate-containing receptors on cell surfaces (as of red blood cells)

et: Latin {it}lectus{/it} (past participle of {it}legere{/it} to pick, select) + {et_link|-in:1|-in:1} {ma}{mat|legend|}{/ma}
shortdef: any of a group of proteins especially of plants that are not antibodies and do not originate in an immune system but bind specifically to carbohydrate-containing receptors on cell surfaces (as of red blood cells)
